Articles.Content: It seems there we can't rename docking ports in 1.1.2  as we could do in 1.0.5. This is a very useful feature for space stations when you want to choose the docking port .you want to use.
I see no means of renaming docking ports in 1.0.5, are you sure you were not using a mod?

I believe that it's Docking Port Alignment Indicator which adds that feature.

Happy landings!

Ah, you're be right, It don't use "docking port indicator" mod, I use the minimalist "Navball docking indicator".

My bad
